humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that there are metastatic carcinomas in 2 out of 7 axillary lymph nodes (N2) in the left breast. This is based on the findings in part B of the report, which states '2. Multiple invasive tumors are present measuring 4, 10, 12, 35 and 40 mm in greatest dimension. 3. Lymphatic invasion is present. 4. Metastatic carcinoma to 2 of 7 axillary lymph nodes.' This information corresponds to New Rule 14, which states that N2 indicates metastases in 4 to 9 axillary lymph nodes.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The patient has metastatic carcinoma to 2 of 7 axillary lymph nodes, as stated in the pathology report (part B, section 4). This corresponds to an N2 stage.
